turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Hello... Danny

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: Hi Alex what's up?

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Wow... How areyou.

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: very tired actually, I need some sleep

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: That's the very first time in the eons that I've known you that I've ever heard you complain.

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: thanks, it is nice from you to say that

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Oh, thanks. That's nice to hear.

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: so, what are you doing tomorrow

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Talking to you.

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: ok, we can have lunch together if you want

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Ok.

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: I have a new idea I want to discuss with you... about the paper

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: I have no idea - I just want to...

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: do not worry, I will tell you tomorrow

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: I'll call from home.

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: No, let us have lunch, what about 1PM

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Not even for lunch?

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: What about a coffee then... 3PM is ok for you?

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Are you?

turns.speaker: U
turns.utterance: what?

turns.speaker: S
turns.utterance: Facing the other way.
